Body: I want to use the Internet Connection of my Windows 10 PC with my Android-Device through USB-Cable.How can I reverse tether through windows 10 using my usb-cable?I have found some similar questions, but the question and its answers are telling me how to use the Android SDK to do USB-Tethering. I don't want to install additional software like the Android SDK.It sounds, like there was an built in solution in windows, but the necessary sharing tab is missing:Is there really no way to do usb-tethering using Windows 10 without installing external software like the Android SDK?
Title: Reverse Tethering (USB) through Windows 10 using Android 4.2.2 without installing additional software

history.Text: I want to use the Internet Connection of my Windows 10 PC with my Android-Device through USB-Cable.How can I reverse tether through windows 10 using my usb-cable?I have found some [similar questions](http://android.stackexchange.com/questions/73168/how-to-use-pcs-internet-on-android-phone-through-usb-cable), but I have found the same issue with the missing sharing tab.Is there really no way to do usb-tethering using Windows 10 without installing external software or the Android SDK?
Reverse Tethering (USB) through Windows 10 using Android 4.2.2

history.Comment: Made the question more unique. The other question (and it's answers) are telling how to install the Android ASK to do USB-Tethering. That's not what I want.
history.Text: I want to use the Internet Connection of my Windows 10 PC with my Android-Device through USB-Cable.How can I reverse tether through windows 10 using my usb-cable?I have found some [similar questions](http://android.stackexchange.com/questions/73168/how-to-use-pcs-internet-on-android-phone-through-usb-cable), but the question and its answers are telling me how to use the Android SDK to do USB-Tethering. I don't want to install additional software like the Android SDK.It sounds, like there was an built in solution in windows, but the necessary sharing tab is missing:[![enter image description here][1]][1]Is there really no way to do usb-tethering using Windows 10 without installing external software like the Android SDK?  [1]: http://i.stack.imgur.com/zKb9R.png
